brmsINLApower 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Sequential Bayesian Assurance Simulation Engine

    brms_inla_power_sequential.Rd

    Simulates assurance for metric in batches, stopping each cell early if the Wilson binomial CI for the current pass rate is wholly above/below target +/- margin.

    brms_inla_power_sequential(
  formula,
  family = gaussian(),
  family_control = NULL,
  Ntrials = NULL,
  E = NULL,
  scale = NULL,
  priors = NULL,
  data_generator = NULL,
  effect_name,
  effect_grid,
  sample_sizes,
  metric = c("direction", "threshold", "rope", "bf"),
  target = 0.8,
  prob_threshold = 0.95,
  effect_threshold = 0,
  rope_bounds = NULL,
  credible_level = 0.95,
  compute_bayes_factor = FALSE,
  error_sd = 1,
  group_sd = 0.5,
  obs_per_group = 10,
  predictor_means = NULL,
  predictor_sds = NULL,
  seed = 1,
  batch_size = 20,
  min_sims = 40,
  max_sims = 600,
  ci_conf = 0.95,
  margin = 0.02,
  num_threads = "1:1",
  family_args = list(),
  progress = TRUE
)

    Arguments

    formula

    Model formula for brms.

    family

    GLM family (e.g. gaussian(), binomial()).

    family_control

    Optional list for INLA's control.family.

    Ntrials, E, scale

    Optional values for specific families (can be generated per-row by data generator).

    priors

    Optional brms prior specification.

    data_generator

    Optional function(n, effect) to generate data; defaults to auto-generator.

    effect_name

    Fixed effect to assess.

    effect_grid

    Vector of true effect values.

    sample_sizes

    Vector of sample sizes.

    metric

    One of "direction", "threshold", "rope", "bf".

    target

    Target assurance value for stopping rule.

    prob_threshold

    Posterior probability threshold for decision rules.

    effect_threshold

    Effect size threshold for "threshold" rules.

    rope_bounds

    Optional length-2 numeric vector for ROPE.

    credible_level

    Credible interval coverage (default 0.95).

    compute_bayes_factor

    Logical; if TRUE and metric=="bf", compute BFs.

    error_sd

    Residual SD (Gaussian).

    group_sd

    Random-effect SD.

    obs_per_group

    Obs per grouping level.

    predictor_means, predictor_sds

    Optional named lists for predictors.

    seed

    Random seed.

    batch_size

    Sims per sequential look.

    min_sims

    Minimum sims before early stop.

    max_sims

    Maximum sims per cell.

    ci_conf

    Confidence level for Wilson CI in stop rule.

    margin

    Margin for target (default 0.02).

    num_threads

    INLA threads.

    family_args

    Named list of family-specific params for data generator.

    progress

    Logical; show progress.

    Value

    List with:

    results

    NULL (no per-replicate storage).

    summary

    Aggregated metrics in standard format.

    settings

    Simulation settings.

    Contents

    Developed by Tony Myers.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
